features.title: Files Redesign
features.desc: The Files page has a brand new look and a bunch of new features, such as drag-and-drop and renaming folders!

features.title: 2FA
features.desc: Admin just got a whole more secure by introducing Two-Factor Authentication to your login! Check you Account page for more information.

features.title: New Explore page
features.desc: The new Explore page allows you to add new simulator devices that come with a brand new Dashboard!
